about_the_game:
Drift Survivor is a small-scale, endlessly challenging arcade-style game with one simple objective: consistently surpass your previous high score and secure your name on the Steam online leaderboard! Along the way, you can earn coins and unlock a variety of new vehicles.


·Drift your car using the throttle and left/right keys! Quickly grab "Time Cores" to extend your gameplay duration.
·Colliding with enemies or walls results in significant time loss, but skillful use of the brake/reverse key can prevent collisions and create impressive evasive maneuvers!
·Eliminating enemies with your vehicle's weapons yields higher scores.


·Paying homage to the fundamentals of classic arcade games!
·Easy-to-learn yet challenging drift controls!
·Random appearance of super weapon crates during gameplay, providing powerful firepower support!
·Collect coins to unlock vehicles with different attributes and appearances!
·Leave your mark on the Steam leaderboard!

Experience the thrill of Drift Survivor today and prove your arcade gaming prowess!


Special statement: Although the word "Survivor" is in the name of the game, this game is not a "Vampire Survivors like" game. This game requires frequent "drifting" operations to move vehicles and avoid enemies. Although there are abundant supply props, it is not a numerical construction game. I apologize if it has misled you!
